short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension to collect and display Digital Art.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
COLLECTR is a supporting tool to display any digital arts on the internet to any screen.
You can collect digital arts on the internet as playlist and display them to another screen immediately.
